The year ends in 2012. In general, 2012 was a very successful year for our country both in the field of sports and in other areas.
All the main tasks facing the country have been implemented this year. Our economy has been developing successfully.
Stronger economic potential will enable us to invest in a bigger future in the future.
The coming year will be a very significant year for the development of our country. Because next year we will lay the foundation for several large projects.
Those projects, each of them is a mega-project.
It will enable us to increase our economic power and to invest more in humanitarian, sport and social issues.
Regarding the sports results of the year, 2012 was a successful year for our athletes. This is a manifestation of the state's attention to sport.
We have continued our efforts to create a sports infrastructure
Two regional Olympic centers have been commissioned this year - in Jalilabad and Astara.
Newly constructed sports facilities were commissioned and repaired in Baku. Republic stadium named after Tofig Bahramov was overhauled
Our athletes have achieved great success in this Olympic Games, and our nation (cont) http://t.co/hEKAO20m
The work done in Azerbaijan in the achievement of this victory also plays a minor role. We have been pursuing a sporting policy.
I call all the young people to take up this chair again. There are opportunities to engage in sports everywhere.
I am very glad that our athletes are examples for young people in their daily life, in their normal life.
The victory in the Olympic Games is a victory. We ranked 30th in the world and 15th in Europe and third in the Islamic world.
The European Olympic Committees General Assembly in Rome on December 8th hosted the first European Olympic Games (cont.) Http://t.co/Mjy7DNYw
This is a historic decision. First of all, because it will be the first European Olympic Games.
Granting these games to us, and delegating this responsibility to us, of course, is a great historical event.
For twenty-one years, we live as an independent state. From the point of view of this short time (cont) http://t.co/c6DL9Cl4
If we had only an international reputation, it would not be difficult for us to take this responsibility if we were not economically able to do so.
